posts.text:
The #RN and #USN do not normally* comment on operational details of the movement of their submarines and #Trump should heed the warning “Loose Lips Sink Ships.”

Clearly Two Dolls Donny's reaction is half-cocked and personal, and he’s given no thought to the dangerously destabilising ambiguity […]

posts.text:
www.motherjones.com/politics/202...

Trump baselessly claimed the revised jobs numbers were rigged—because of course he did. Experts laughed, noting it’d take an army of bureaucrats ditching decades of protocol to fake a stat just to annoy him. Nixon looks subtle by comparison.

#trump #maga
